summary: Continuing from Ong Bak 2's 1440s, Prince Tien fails to revenge his parents' murder by the evil new ruler. The beaten Tien is rescued. Can he bring peace to the kingdom?
cast: Tony Jaa|Primorata Dejudom|Dan Chupong|Nirut Sirichanya|Petchtai Wongkamlao|Sarunyu Wongkrachang|Sorapong Chatree|Chumphorn Thepphithak|Philip Hersh
title: Ong Bak 3
